parameters.query:
=SELECT 
  (SELECT id FROM keyword_projects WHERE id = {{ $json.projectId }}) as project_id,
  (SELECT project_name FROM keyword_projects WHERE id = {{ $json.projectId }}) as project_name,
  (SELECT main_keyword FROM keyword_projects WHERE id = {{ $json.projectId }}) as main_keyword

=SELECT 
  cd.id,
  cd.competitor_url,
  cd.competitor_domain,
  cd.serp_position,
  cd.title,
  cd.meta_description,
  cd.word_count,
  cd.h1_count,
  cd.h2_count,
  cd.h3_count,
  cd.h4_count,
  cd.h5_count,
  cd.h6_count,
  cd.headings_json,
  cd.domain_rating,
  cd.backlinks_count,
  cd.source,
  cd.analyzed_at
FROM competitor_data cd
WHERE cd.project_id = {{ $json.projectId }}
ORDER BY cd.serp_position ASC
